songs.title: Mangos
songs.lyrics:
Letra de "Mangos"
[Verse 1]
Stand up and do it
You can do it now
Take and leave it
You can do it now

[Chorus 1]
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
Is gone, is gone, is gone, is gone, is gone

[Verse 2]
Wake up and do it
You can do it now
Push, push and fight
You can do it now

[Chorus 2]
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
She's gone, is gone, is gone
Is gone, is gone, is gone, is gone, is gone

[Bridge 1]
You can dream staying steady on
You're broken by his love
You can dream staying steady on
You're broken by this love
Woi yo yo

[Chorus 2]
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo

[Post-Chorus]
Wake up and live it now
You can do it now
You can do it now
You can do it now

[Bridge 1]
Say
You can dream staying steady on
You're broken by this love
You can dream staying steady on
You're broken by this love
Woi yo yo yo

[Chorus 2]
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo

[Post-Chorus]
You can do it now
You can do it now
You can do it now
Stand up!

[Outro]
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
You can do it now
You can do it now
You can do it now
Stand up!
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
Woi yo yo yo yo yo
Woi yo yo
